reviews: I love these leggings to death, I would buy 100 of them if I could. I'm 5 ft 6 167 lbs with a very athletic build, I bought the plus size and they fit great but anyone thinner might wanna choose the regular size unless u like a looser fit. So soft and adorable print too!

name: Leggings Depot
reviews: Inexpensive, high waisted, very soft and comfortable, and cute.  I'm 5'4" and wear a size 16 in jeans or a 14 in skinny jeans.  These fit just fine, but with extra length at the ankles.  They still look good, but I do think they'd work fine for someone 6 feet tall as well.  I've washed them a handful of times and experienced zero fading or pilling.  I'd love to have them in every design, and think depending on the design they can be dressed up or down.  They also would work great for yoga, the gym, or pjs around the house.  I'm very happy with mine.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 January 2018

name: Leggings Depot
reviews: I have ordered from this company many times before with pleasant results. I ordered a light blue color this time and I was surprised that they were fairly see through. name: Leggings Depot
reviews: Ok, at rhe risk of being redundant I have to say how much I love these leggings!!! The diverse choice of colors and patterns combined with the texture and fit makes these great.  I have never bought LR leggings but do have several active wear brands.  These are prettier and softer.  I am not a young woman so I was a little hesitant in wearing these outdoors.  That being said, as long as you wear a long enough top to cover your rear end I think it's totally doable.  I am retired and lead an a tive, casual life.  So many compliments have come my way!! I get the small size being 5'4 and 136 lbs.  Have already recommended Legging Depot to several women.  I am always checking to see if new paaterns are being released.
